meanings.definition: A view or scene of snow-covered land.
meanings.sent1: The snowscape outside my window was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent2: I love taking photos of the snowscape during winter.
meanings.sent3: The snowscape looked like a giant marshmallow world.
meanings.sent4: The snowscape stretched out like a white blanket covering the earth.
meanings.sent5: The snowscape sparkled under the sunlight, creating a magical scene.

meanings.definition: The overall appearance of a snowy landscape.
meanings.sent1: The snowscape in the mountains was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the essence of the snowscape in his painting.
meanings.sent3: The snowscape resembled a giant vanilla ice cream cone.
meanings.sent4: The snowscape was a canvas of white waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The snowscape painted a picture of tranquility and peace in my mind.
